TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceUrlGenerator

summary.span: 定义一个方法，设计器宿主必须实现该方法来为嵌入式资源提供 URL 引用查找。

span.span: Defines the method that a designer-host must implement to provide URL reference look-up for embedded resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 版本 2.0 提供的功能嵌入的资源从程序集检索的控件，如控件。ASP.NET version 2.0 provides the ability to retrieve embedded resources from an assembly for controls, such as the control. 在运行时，嵌入资源的 URL 可以使用检索方法的类。At run time, the URL to the embedded resource can be retrieved using the method of the class. 若要提供设计时表示用于从程序集生成的资源 URL，设计器宿主可以提供一种服务，实现接口。To provide a design-time means for generating a resource URL from an assembly, designer hosts can offer a service that implements the interface. 更多相关信息：For more information: - 在使用在本地化的资源，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。On using resources in localization, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). - 在使用嵌入的资源，请参阅[NIB： 如何：使用资源在 Web 服务器控件中设置属性值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb)和[如何：以编程方式检索资源值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28)。On using embedded resources, see [NIB:How to: Use Resources to Set Property Values in Web Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb) and [How to: Retrieve Resource Values Programmatically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28). - 有关控件设计器，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件设计器概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wxh45wzs(v=vs.100))。On control designers, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wxh45wzs(v=vs.100)). 接口包含一个方法，返回给定的资源类型和名称的资源的 URL 引用的方法。The interface has one method, the method, that returns a URL reference to a resource given the resource type and name.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetResourceUrl (Type type, string resourceName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetResourceUrl(class System.Type type, string resourceName) cil managed
public: System::String ^ GetResourceUrl(Type ^ type, System::String ^ resourceName);
abstract member GetResourceUrl : Type * string -> string

param.name: type
param.span: 包含嵌入式资源的程序集中的类型。

span.span: The type in the assembly that contains the embedded resource.
The name of the resource to retrieve.

summary.span: 返回对嵌入式资源（位于在设计时使用的程序集中）的 URL 引用。

span.span: Returns a URL reference to an embedded resource in an assembly that is used at design time.

returns.span: 对资源的 URL 引用。

span.span: The URL reference to the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，方法返回对资源的 URL。At run time, the method returns a URL to a resource. 类定义用于加载嵌入的资源的 HTTP 处理程序。The class defines the HTTP handler that is used to load embedded resources. 在设计时方法的类将检测在设计模式和设计器主机服务实现，它返回的 URL 的代理。At design time, the method of the class detects design mode and delegates to the designer-host service implementation, which returns a URL.
